scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run test:circuits
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:watch" "cd client && npm run test:watch" "cd circuits && npm run test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:coverage" "cd client && npm run test:coverage" "cd circuits && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
